name: Development road map
body:
### Step 1
Model dividend pathways with a flat tax

![dividend pathways](http://i.imgur.com/wAuJ0Jf.png)

### Step 2

Simulate and popularise the concept


### Step 3

Add dynamic taxRate governance

### Resources

Live network [http://graph.basicincome.co](http://graph.basicincome.co) (2014)

NodeJS app: https://github.com/p2p-safety-net-co-op-dividend-scheme/server
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
